member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN
member.summary: Contains the information needed by renderers to draw glyph runs with glyph color information. All coordinates are in device independent pixels (DIPs).

member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN.glyphRun
member.summary: Glyph run to draw for this layer.

member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN.glyphRunDescription
member.summary: Pointer to the glyph run description for this layer. This may be NULL. For example, when the original glyph run is split into multiple layers, one layer might have a description and the others have none.

member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN.baselineOriginX
member.summary: X coordinate of the baseline origin for the layer.

member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN.baselineOriginY
member.summary: Y coordinate of the baseline origin for the layer.

member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN.runColor
member.summary: Color value of the run; if all members are zero, the run should be drawn using the current brush.

member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN.paletteIndex
member.summary: Zero-based index into the font’s color palette; if this is 0xFFFF, the run should be drawn using the current brush.
